structure:Codelist.common:Name: Greek NEET Category Classification
structure:Codelist.common:Description: Classification of NEET (Not in Education, Employment, or Training) categories following international standards for youth statistics.

structure:Code.common:Name: Not applicable
structure:Code.common:Description: Not applicable to the data or special processing code.

structure:Code.common:Name: Total NEET population
structure:Code.common:Description: Total population not in education, employment, or training.

structure:Code.common:Name: Seek job but not available
structure:Code.common:Description: Individuals actively seeking employment but not currently available for work.

structure:Code.common:Name: Unemployed
structure:Code.common:Description: Individuals who are unemployed and not in education or training.

structure:Code.common:Name: Like to work but not seek job
structure:Code.common:Description: Individuals who would like to work but are not actively seeking employment.

structure:Code.common:Name: Other NEET categories
structure:Code.common:Description: Other categories of individuals not in education, employment, or training.
